import AppNavbar from "../secrions/AppNavbar"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useAppContext } from "../../context/appContext"; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; // import Wrapper from "../../Wrapper/ProDet"; import { GET_PRODUCTS, UPDATE_PRODUCT, DELETE_PRODUCT, RESET_PRO, } from "../../rtk/slices/productsSlice"; const ProDetailes = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { products } = useSelector((state) => state.products); const { toCart } = useAppContext(); const params = useParams(); const [product, setValue] = useState(""); const [list_Size, set_List_Size] = useState(""); const [list_Color, set_List_Color] = useState(""); const [Qnt, set_Qnt] = useState(""); const [cart, setCart] = useState(""); // const { getProduct } = useAppContext(); // const x = useRef(true); useEffect(() => { (async () => { const res = await axios.get(`/productDetailes/${params.id}`); // dispatch(GET_PRODUCTS(res.data.product)); console.log(res); setValue(res.data.product); // console.log(res); // getProduct(params.id); // setValue(res.data.size); // getsize(); })(); }, [params.id]); const setSize = (e) => { set_List_Size({ ...list_Size, selectedSize: e, }); setCart({ ...product, selectedSize: e, }); }; const setColor = (e) => { console.log(e); set_List_Color({ ...list_Color, ...cart, selectedColor: e, }); setCart({ ...product, ...cart, selectedColor: e, }); }; const setQnt = (e) => { console.log(e); set_Qnt({ ...Qnt, ...cart, qnt: e, }); setCart({ ...product, ...cart, qnt: e, }); }; const addHandle = (product) => { toCart(cart); }; const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const increment = () => { const qnt = quantity + 1; setQuantity(qnt); }; const decrease = () => { if (quantity > 1) { const qnt = quantity - 1; setQuantity(qnt); } }; console.log(cart); return ( <> {product.image && (

))}
